# @babel/types

> Babel Types is a Lodash-esque utility library for AST nodes

See our website [@babel/types](https://babeljs.io/docs/babel-types) for more information or the [issues](https://github.com/AshrafMorningstar associated with this package.

## Install

Using npm:

```sh
npm install --save-dev @babel/types
```

or using yarn:

```sh
yarn add @babel/types --dev
```
